instruction: Create a children's story based on a given theme.
output: Once upon a time, there were two best friends named Daisy and Lily. They both always loved to explore and have grand adventures together. One day, they traveled to a magical kingdom filled with wondrous creatures and treats. Along the way, they made new friends, discovered hidden gems, and experienced the joys of true friendship. They cherished the memories they made and vowed to be lifelong companions.
